channel.title: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?
channel.description:
i want that a monster will kill everyone but not my.
or,if you type a command that a certain monster wil attack the given name. is this possible?
for the last question look for the latest post of mine.
sorry for my bad english i am dutch.

item.title: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @kiprok kiprok
item.description:
@kiprok wrote:

mayby its posible that a command toggles agresive on and off?
and can someone help me with agresive i am using combatscape based on delta.

Read full topic
item.source: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?

item.title: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

Well, from my stand point. I do think it’s possible in some way but in others I don’t. Possible wise, like the people said just have it to when you do the command it takes away HP and, then you can make it (I Think I’m not sure this is the impossible part for me) to where a NPC ID of your choice spawns but doesn’t attack the player just looks like it is by the command taking the hp away and when they die you can do sM(“Oh Em Gee Npcname Killed you!”)

Read full topic
item.source: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?

item.title: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @kiprok kiprok
item.description:
@kiprok wrote:

no that is not what i want i playing with my friends and each has his kingdom evryting works well(exept agresive if someone could help i use combatscape and that is based on delta),
but i want that each of us have a boss and that if someone come in his kingdom that the boss will attack the intruder.
tanks for you reaction.

Read full topic

item.title: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @darkanton darkanton
item.description:
@darkanton wrote:

Thats an realy cool idea tbh, it probably aint possible well not of what i know, but you could just make a command that poisens a player or a kill command if you want them dead Lool.

Read full topic
item.source: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?

item.title: Monsters react on name or command. is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @kiprok kiprok
item.description:
@kiprok wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:2, topic:349443”]isn’t it better to add a eat command or a killall command???

and if u must have a npc u can just change how much it hits and type in ::npc **** and it will start killing all around you :O[/quote]
thats not what i want.

as example:

::kill playername

and then the appropriate NPC to attack than the designated player.

Read full topic
